segments.text: Ugh, what a filthy mess in this kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water's spilling everywhere from that sink, soaking the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman's just drying dishes, letting it all happen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her apron's probably getting wet too, and she doesn't care.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The kids are rummaging in the cookie jar like little thieves.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That stool's dirty from the floor, and the boy's feet are all over it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Crumbled cookies might fall into that puddleâ€”gross.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The cabinets are open, inviting more chaos and dust.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Outside the window, the garden's clean, but here it's revolting.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Stacked dishes look greasy; who knows when they were washed.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't stand seeing this sloppiness.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole scene makes my skin crawl.
segments.speaker: PAR
